name: Rolepaying Game
description:
Premise

You are called to adventure by the mayor of Moniwealth, where you must slay the monsters terrorizing the town! You are eager to help but... why is everything so expensive here!? 

In Rolepaying Game, you must battle monsters, gather resources, and try and survive in the harsh economic structure of the world.

Controls

WASD - Move

Click - Interact with buttons

E - Interact with NPC and Objects

Outside assets used: Credits
